introduction: Iâ€™m a Software Engineer specializing in Full Stack Development and Cybersecurity, with nearly 4 years of hands-on experience in designing and developing high-performance systems and products.
summary: Iâ€™m passionate about creating scalable and reliable solutions, with a focus on delivering seamless user experiences and robust backend infrastructures. I thrive in fast-paced environments, continuously learning, and taking on new challenges to drive innovation.
myStoryContent: My first experience with coding came during high school. Even without a computer at home, I spent countless hours in the school computer lab during breaks, learning the basics of C++. My first project? A 'Who Wants to Be a Millionaire' game, simple yet incredibly rewarding.

In 10th grade, I attended a hacking workshop at DTU, which ignited my passion for cybersecurity. This marked the beginning of an exciting journey into tech, leading me to pursue a Bachelor's degree in Information Technology from MAIT, New Delhi.

During college, I interned at Grappus, which transitioned into a full-time role as a Full Stack Developer. It was a whirlwind of learning and growth, as I took on various challenging projects and developed strong technical and interpersonal skills.
myStoryConclusion: Currently, Iâ€™m working as a Software Engineer at Deutsche Telekom Digital Labs. Iâ€™m always eager to explore new opportunities and dive deeper into the world of technology.
restOfTheInternet: Find me on the rest of the internet.
